text: Hello, I need help with setting up an integration
Hello! How can we help you today?
I'm trying to connect to Azure Blob Storage
Thanks for your message. Our team will get back to you soon.
How do I create a new integration?
You can create a new integration by going to the Integrations page and clicking the 'New Integration' button. Would you like me to walk you through the steps?
Where can I find documentation about templates?
Our documentation on templates can be found in the Documentation Portal under 'Integration Guides > Templates'. You can also access it directly at /documentation/integration/templates.
I'm getting an error when trying to save my integration
I'll help you troubleshoot that error. Could you please provide more details about the error message you're seeing?
